attributes.action: Scrap all legislation relating to the now discredited Home Information Packs (HIPs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should acnowlege that they made a mistake by trying to introduce this unfair & unnessesary extra burden on the home owners of this country, and immediately scrap the introduction of Home Information Packs.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap all legislation relating to the now discredited Home Information Packs (HIPs)"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14772.asp

Prime Minister's Office
